name: Toribash Help File
summary: Learn about .WBT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Replays of Toribash matches are saved with an .RPL extension.

description: Contains help documentation for Toribash, a 3D fighting game where users create the characters' moves; may include tutorials, FAQs, and other game help; must be stored in the scripts folder in order to open correctly.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .wbt file in Cyberbotics Webots
images.caption: WBT file open in Cyberbotics Webots
